main_title: Ujjivan Bank Electric Three Wheeler Loan

text: We provide customized financing options for both the battery types- Lead Acid Battery & Lithium Ion Battery.
Up to 80% funding on on-road price.
Flexible repayment options, ranging from 12 to 36 months.
Hassle free documentation.
Competitive Interest Rates.
Individual between 18 to 59 years of age.
KYC Documents.
One security cheque.
One passport size photograph.
Own House Proof Document(Based on assessment or scheme).
Loan Tenure ==> 12 - 36 months(The maximum tenure is dependent on the variant of the battery).
Rate of Interest ==> 22% - 25% p.a. (reducing balance).
Processing Fee ==> 2% of loan amount (excluding applicable GST).
Documentation Charges ==> `950 (excluding applicable GST).
Stamp duty ==> As per the state by-laws.
CERSAI Charges ==> At actuals.
Late Payment Charges ==> 2% flat on the overdue amount (excluding applicable GST).
Bounce Charges ==> `450 per bounce.
Pre-closure Charges ==> Pre-closure of loan will attract a pre-payment penalty of 2% p.a. of principal outstanding (excluding applicable GST).
